block.p: NEW YORK has hundreds of all-night services to meet the nocturnal needs of the sick, the tired, the unfortunate and the harried. Here are some examples. Key: B: Will go to Brooklyn Q: Will go to Queens Bx: Will go to The Bronx COURIERS AND MESSENGERS Able (B,Q,BX) . . . (212) 687-5515 Bullit (B,Q,BX) . . . (212) 983-7400 DHL (international) . . .
